snippet.title: Thumper - Release Trailer (Switch/PS4/Steam/Xbox/Oculus/iOS/Android/Stadia)
snippet.description:
Thumper is rhythm violence: classic rhythm-action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the hellish void and confront a maniacal giant head from the future. Play in 2D or VR.

Steam ►http://store.steampowered.com/app/356400
PS4/PSVR ►https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-us/games/thumper/cid=UP1613-CUSA03559_00-THUMPERPS4FULL00
Nintendo Switch ►http://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/thumper-switch
Xbox One ►https://www.microsoft.com/en-US/store/p/Thumper/C4CCRJK7J4SS
iOS ►https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/thumper-pocket-edition/id1287138671
Oculus Rift ►https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1264016100304079/
Oculus Go ►https://www.oculus.com/experiences/go/1825982230769075/
Oculus Quest ►https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/1854124104686464/
Android ►https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Drool.ThumperPocketEdition
Stadia ►https://stadia.google.com/store/details/c121d8b3fa744b52b71bf3599cb3da7frcp1/sku/6e98f34bbcae444a99816b8f2613452b

Official Website ►http://thumpergame.com  
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/thumpergame
